Hero.header: Explore affordable and accessible carpooling for exciting travel adventures.
Hero.description: Join our carpool community for eco-friendly, cost-effective travel options in North Macedonia.

Benefits.header: What you will get while using TRAVEL

benefit1.title: Cost-saving Opportunities
benefit1.description: Save money on transportation costs by sharing rides, splitting fuel expenses, tolls, and parking fees with fellow travelers, making travel more affordable for everyone.

benefit2.title: Social Connections
benefit2.description: Connect with like-minded individuals and expand your social network through shared rides, fostering meaningful relationships and memorable experiences along the way.

benefit3.title: Flexible Scheduling
benefit3.description: Enjoy the flexibility to plan rides according to your schedule and preferences, offering convenient transportation options that adapt to your lifestyle and commitments.

benefit4.title: Eco-friendly Travel
benefit4.description: Promote environmental sustainability by traveling with eco-friendly vehicles, reducing pollution and carbon footprint while also cutting down travel costs for users.

Safety.description: Read the guidelines below to ensure your safety

safety1.title: Verify Driver Information
safety1.description: Before accepting a ride, verify the driver's information including their name, photo, and license plate number.

safety2.title: Share Trip Details
safety2.description: Share trip details with a trusted contact, including the driver's information and estimated time of arrival.

safety3.title: Meet in Public Locations
safety3.description: Always meet the driver in a public, well-lit area, and avoid getting into the vehicle if you feel uncomfortable.

safety4.title: Buckle Up
safety4.description: Wear your seatbelt during the entire ride, regardless of the distance or duration.

safety5.title: Stay Alert
safety5.description: Stay alert during the ride and trust your instincts. If something feels off, don't hesitate to speak up or request to end the trip.

safety6.title: Rate and Review
safety6.description: After the ride, rate and review the driver based on your experience. This helps maintain accountability within the community.
